channel.title: [PI] Pleasssee i need somebody whos added custom items [PI]
channel.description: Please somebody help me ive done everything right. Ive put the ints into itemdef made a file named "Raw" and put the new models in it. But th problem is "add model" doesnt work! Please someone tell me another way of how to load the custom models into the client. I know people do it since famous servers such as runemyth is based off [PI] and if you look in there client cache they have the Raw folder exactly like I do. So what did they do that i didnt. pllleeeaasee heelp

item.title: [PI] Pleasssee i need somebody whos added custom items [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

i do add models , added models for d claws and it said they were added succesfully…
but when i spawn d claws it still is invinsible…

item.title: [PI] Pleasssee i need somebody whos added custom items [PI]
item.dc:creator: @NathanielBacon NathanielBacon
item.description:
@NathanielBacon wrote:

public void preloadModels() {
File file = new File("./Raw/");
File[] fileArray = file.listFiles();
for(int y = 0; y < fileArray.length; y++) {
String s = fileArray[y].getName();
byte[] buffer = ReadFile("./Raw/"+s);
Model.method460(buffer,Integer.parseInt(getFileNameWithoutExtension(s)));
}
}

: O

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pleasssee i need somebody whos added custom items [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

nope , you need to write add model in-game and then type the model ID.
also , you have to ZIP the .dat files ( models ) and put the .GZ files in Raw folder.
at least , that’s how it worked for me…

Read full topic
